55b6dfde-f209-494f-a54c-d83d46daf032.name: zero tolerance for bugs
55b6dfde-f209-494f-a54c-d83d46daf032.description:
A good software does not have bugs. It just works - it might be simple or even dummy looking, but it just works without bugs.
A bug is like broken window - have several of them and the value of your building will go down straight to zero.

ee1e6599-b5e2-4d84-9e10-bee9790ddb8c.name: The documentation is integral part of the application
ee1e6599-b5e2-4d84-9e10-bee9790ddb8c.description: Any application with missing,non-up-to-date or incorrect documentation is undermining the user-experience of its users on purpose.

31ce9bba-5fc7-462d-8b5c-9906bf24e8f1.name: 10x efficiency gain with time invested in planning
31ce9bba-5fc7-462d-8b5c-9906bf24e8f1.description: 1 unit of time invested in planning usually saves 10 times more in execution

ad274bc3-bac0-4257-92ac-d56047f96cbc.name: everything is interconnected in life
ad274bc3-bac0-4257-92ac-d56047f96cbc.description: Everything you do now is dependant and will be interdependant to everything hapenning to you. Thus do your best and leave the rest.

d5d7b5e4-ce93-4a48-85d6-ee944a6b91f5.name: aim for 10x improvement
d5d7b5e4-ce93-4a48-85d6-ee944a6b91f5.description:
Any activity which does not aim for more than a 10x impovement in the long run will be outcompeted.
Google.
